ClientSideComponentInstance.Title: ShareToTeams
ClientSideComponentInstance.Properties: {"supportedFileTypes": "doc, docx, pdf, ppsx, ppt, pptx, jpg, jpeg, png, xls, xlsx, txt, html, gif","allowListShareing":true,"allowFolderShareing":true,"allowFileShareing":true,"librarySharingMethod":"page","folderSharingMethod":"native"}
